edu.ncsu.dre.impl.data
Class TextArtifact

java.lang.Object
  edu.ncsu.dre.impl.data.TextArtifact
All Implemented Interfaces:
Artifact, java.io.Serializable
public class TextArtifact
extends java.lang.Object
implements Artifact

This implementation of artifact handles all text based research queries. The class has been properly overloaded to accept text input as String or Files. Files can be of MIME type text/* or PDF. Microsoft File Formats are not supported yet. DRE Developers can extend this to add support for new file formats and other types of text inputs.

Author:
Santthosh Babu Selvadurai
See Also:
Serialized Form

TextArtifact

public TextArtifact(java.io.File inputArtifact)
             throws DREIllegalArgumentException,
                    DRERuntimeException
Constructor overload, accepts a File and uses the file utilities from edu.ncsu.dre.util to extract the entire string from the file. The function can process text files, unencrypted PDF files and encrypted PDF files with out any passwords attached to them.

Parameters:
inputArtifact -
Throws:
DREIllegalArgumentException
DRERuntimeException
Method Detail

getQuery

public java.lang.Object getQuery()
Description copied from interface: Artifact
Generalized method for returning the query object. This normally used by a Segregator where it is divided and passed onto scheduler for further research.
